ai-patthana24.18:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana24.18:0.3_0: There’s no deposited for the sake of nymphs.
ai-patthana24.18:1.1_0: Not for the sake of refuge to the teaching, the for the sake of refuge, for the sake of causes and reason.
ai-patthana24.18:2.1_0: You don’t cause for the sake of refuge to the teaching ... for the sake of nymphs.
ai-patthana24.18:3.1_0: Nor cause or reason for the sake of cause, cause, reason for the sake of purification, for the sake of cause, reason for the sake of heavenly gain ...
